# Data Wrangling 

```{r data wrangling, message=FALSE}

players <- read_delim("nhlps2.csv", delim = "\t", 
    escape_double = FALSE, trim_ws = TRUE)

standings <- read_csv("standings_2018_2019.csv", 
                      show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
  select(-c(...11, ...12, ...13, ...14, ...15))

```
